analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x70538834e68efe5061a11c4999fc050e55ae2b68.sol:
	Contract AYA has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x70538834e68efe5061a11c4999fc050e55ae2b68.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0x70538834e68efe5061a11c4999fc050e55ae2b68.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
